column2: Dourhand]] steward when the [[Longbeards]] were absent in the [[Ered Luin]]. He killed the guards of the Silver Deep Mines and poisoned their leader, [[Olin]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
column4: Dáin]], [[King under the Mountain]], wanted a tribute of them he refused to give him anything.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
column5: Introduction]], ''Intro: Return from the Lonely Mountain''</ref> Eventually he would make an alliance between him and the [[Goblins]] of the Mirkstone Tunnels<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
column6: Introduction]], ''Intro: Goblin Prowlers''</ref> and revived [[Skorgrím Dourhand]] with the aid of Ivar Bloodhand. But he was slain by [[Dwalin]] and the player before Skorgrím's reviving was complete.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Ered Luin Introduction
